message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can do $132.50. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I was really hoping to get it for $130. Is that still not possible?
I understand you're really close to your target, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $129.99. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $129.99, but I was really hoping to get it for $130. Can you do that for me?
